In 93' thislil guy came to be.

My Life

Throughout my youth, I've always been creative. In High School, Art classes are where I excelled and yet I still had an itch to immerse myself in technology. After joining the U.S. Army at 17 years old, I was introduced to the IT realm by configuring and maintaining communications systems. This allowed me to gain a foundational knowledge of how data and systems interact with each other.


I grew interest in software development because of the 'work-from-home' lifestyle, the lucrative salaries, the freedom and I wanted in! Since enrolling at Bottega University's Full Stack Program, I've built at least 5 web applications with various technology stacks centered around HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I can say I've found my happy middle ground, where art meets code.

Career Goals

I welcome opportunities as a Frontend Developer or Full Stack Engineer. I seek to build apps that will change lives, add value to society and hopefully retire me early. I want to be both creator and asset as I grow. I'd love to mentor junior developers and help find their footing.
